sentence.Network_en: It really puts me off a place when the washroom is dirty.
sentence.Network_cn: 厕所很脏,令我对那个地方很反感.

sentence.Network_en: I hung around until Helen had to go to the washroom.
sentence.Network_cn: 我在外边一直等到海伦不得不上厕所.

sentence.Network_en: To have a private washroom was luxurious.
sentence.Network_cn: 有私人盥洗室是再惬意不过的.

entry.def: A washroom is a room with toilets and washing facilities, situated in a large building such as a factory or an office block.

means.word_mean: 1. especially a lavatory in a public place

auth_sentence.content: I had to stop at the gas station on the way to work this morning and use the washroom.
